item.title: Weekly Review #59 - Desert Journey, Family and Kin
item.description: 'Photograph - Ed Sheeran' Preface This piece chronicles my life and reflections from May 1st to May 15th, 2024. During the May Day holiday, I traveled to Inner Mongolia with my family. It wasn’t until we set off that I realized this was the first time we had ventured on a distant journey together. Previously, our furthest excursion had been a drive to Shanghai Disneyland. It was quite a different experience.
